content:
1. Montreux Jazz Festival - held in Montreux, Switzerland
2. New Orleans Jazz & Heritage Festival - held in New Orleans, USA
3. North Sea Jazz Festival - held in Rotterdam, Netherlands
4. Monterey Jazz Festival - held in Monterey, USA
5. Jazz à Vienne - held in Vienne, France
6. Copenhagen Jazz Festival - held in Copenhagen, Denmark
7. Umbria Jazz Festival - held in Perugia, Italy
8. Newport Jazz Festival - held in Newport, USA
9. Toronto Jazz Festival - Held in Toronto, Canada
10. Winter Jazz Fest - held in New York, USA.
